descriptions.CMN: Mohammed V International Airport is Morocco's main international gateway located near Casablanca, serving millions of passengers annually.
descriptions.RAK: Marrakech Menara Airport is a major international airport serving the popular tourist destination of Marrakech.
descriptions.AGA: Al Massira Airport serves Agadir, a major beach resort destination on Morocco's southern Atlantic coast.
descriptions.AHU: Cherif Al Idrissi Airport is a regional airport serving Al Hoceima and the surrounding area in northern Morocco.
descriptions.BEM: Beni Mellal Airport is a small regional airport serving the Beni Mellal-Khenifra region.
descriptions.ERH: Moulay Ali Cherif Airport serves the city of Errachidia and surrounding areas in eastern Morocco.
descriptions.ESU: Essaouira Mogador Airport connects the coastal city of Essaouira to other Moroccan destinations.
descriptions.FEZ: Fes Sais International Airport serves Morocco's cultural and spiritual capital, Fes.
descriptions.NDR: Nador International Airport serves the northeastern Rif region of Morocco.
descriptions.OZZ: Ouarzazate Airport serves as a gateway to the Sahara Desert and Morocco's southeastern regions.
descriptions.OUD: Oujda Angads International Airport serves the eastern Moroccan city of Oujda and nearby areas.
descriptions.RBA: Rabat-Salé Airport serves Morocco's capital city Rabat and the twin city of Salé.
descriptions.TNG: Tangier Ibn Battouta Airport connects northern Morocco to destinations across Europe and the Middle East.
descriptions.TTU: Tetouan Sania Ramel Airport serves the northern Moroccan city of Tetouan.
descriptions.VIL: Dakhla Airport serves the coastal city of Dakhla in southern Morocco.
descriptions.EUN: Hassan I Airport serves Laayoune, the largest city in the Western Sahara territory.
descriptions.TTA: Tan Tan Plage Blanche Airport serves the southwestern coastal town of Tan Tan.
descriptions.GLN: Guelmim Airport serves the southern Moroccan city known as the gateway to the desert.
descriptions.OZG: Zagora Airport provides access to the southeastern desert regions of Morocco.
descriptions.UAR: Bouarfa Airport is a small regional airport serving the eastern Moroccan town of Bouarfa.

home.tagline: Discover the gateways to the kingdom's treasures
home.checkInDesc: Fast and modern check-in services at all our airports.
home.shoppingDesc: Discover authentic Moroccan products and international brands.
home.diningDesc: Experience Moroccan and international cuisine at our terminals.
home.networkDesc: ONDA manages 25 airports across the Kingdom of Morocco, serving millions of passengers annually.
home.networkText: From the bustling hub of Casablanca to scenic airports in Tangier and Dakhla, we connect Morocco to the world.

about.title: About ONDA
about.description: The Moroccan Airports Authority or commonly known as ONDA (Arabic: المكتب الوطني للمطارات, French: Office national des aéroports) is the Moroccan airport operator and administrator. The company's headquarters are in Mohammed V International Airport in Casablanca.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To position Morocco as a leading aviation hub in Africa by providing world-class airport facilities and services.

mission.title: Mission & Values
mission.tourism: Promote Morocco as a tourist destination

history.title: History
history.content: ONDA was established in July 1990 under parliamentary law 14–89. Prior to then, Morocco's airports were administered by the Moroccan Ministry of transport. One year later, ONDA inaugurated Al Massira Airport in Agadir. On 15 September 2003, Abdelhanine Benallou was nominated as the new general manager of ONDA.

milestones.title: Key Milestones
milestones.1990: Establishment of ONDA under parliamentary law 14–89
milestones.1991: Inauguration of Al Massira Airport in Agadir
milestones.2003: Abdelhanine Benallou nominated as the new general manager of ONDA
milestones.2004: Creation of masterplan to upgrade many facilities by 2010

accidents.title: Serious airport related accidents
accidents.content: Although Morocco has its share in aircraft accidents, the number of serious incidents with fatalities directly related to an airport (approach, take-off or on ground accidents) is very low. The total number of accidents with fatalities in Morocco is 19, resulting in 792 deaths. The same numbers for events directly related to airports are 5 and 171, respectively. The majority of the airport related incidents happened long ago, with the last incident occurring in 1986.

development.title: New developments and plans
development.intro: Around 2004, ONDA created a masterplan to upgrade many facilities by 2010. The main projects include:
development.note: Apart from these larger plans, some other smaller changes are planned around many airports around the country.

projects.0: Build a new terminal of 60,000 m² and a total yearly capacity of 10 million people (end 2006)
projects.1: Upgrade terminal 1: general overhaul and upgrade T1 to increase traffic safety (May 2007)
projects.2: Build new cargo terminal of 30,000 m² and 150,000 tonnes/year (2007)
projects.4: New parking facility and transport link

projects.2: Strengthen the versatile side of the movement area

projects.1: New terminal, aircraft stands and transport links (2008)
projects.2: Work on cargo terminal, taxiway parallel to runway, maintenance infra

projects.0: Building new terminal to separate military and commercial activities (2007)
projects.1: Other works, including control tower and national fence
Extend runway, build parking apron, new taxi-way and two support buildings

projects.0: Reshape and extend existing terminal (2007 and phase 2: 2015)
projects.1: Extend plane-areas: general, runway, plane park, vehicle parking
New roads, new ONDA centre, new pedestrian path

management.title: Management & Governance
management.boardDescription: 12 members representing various ministries and sectors

services.title: Nos Services
services.subtitle: Découvrez les services de qualité offerts dans les aéroports marocains

checkIn.title: Enregistrement
checkIn.description: Enregistrement rapide et efficace aux comptoirs ou via nos bornes en libre-service.

baggage.title: Services Bagages
baggage.description: Enregistrement, suivi et récupération des bagages avec des systèmes modernes.

customs.title: Douanes et Immigration
customs.description: Procédures douanières et d'immigration simplifiées pour un voyage sans souci.

shopping.title: Shopping Hors Taxes
shopping.description: Large gamme de produits locaux et internationaux à des prix avantageux.

dining.description: Restaurants et cafés proposant des spécialités marocaines et internationales.

wifi.description: Connexion Wi-Fi gratuite disponible dans tous nos terminaux.

currencyExchange.title: Bureau de Change
currencyExchange.description: Services de change de devises aux taux compétitifs dans tous nos aéroports.

parking.title: Parking
parking.description: Options de stationnement sécurisées à court et long terme près des terminaux.

vip.title: Services VIP
vip.subtitle: Une expérience de voyage exceptionnelle
vip.description: Profitez d'une expérience exclusive avec nos services VIP conçus pour offrir un confort et une commodité inégalés à nos voyageurs les plus exigeants.
vip.benefit2: Assistance personnalisée pour l'enregistrement et les bagages
vip.benefit3: Voies prioritaires pour le contrôle de sécurité et l'immigration
vip.benefit4: Transport dédié entre le terminal et l'avion

contactUs.title: Besoin d'informations supplémentaires ?
contactUs.description: Pour toute question concernant nos services ou pour des demandes spéciales, n'hésitez pas à contacter notre équipe de service client.
